Generation VII.Sun: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
Generation VII.Moon: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
